key_risks: High valuation multiples raising skepticism among investors
Dependence on third-party cloud infrastructure providers
Intense competitive pressures from established and emerging players
controversies: Major data breach in 2024 affecting over 160 customers
Multidistrict litigation (MDL No. 3126) related to the data breach
environmental_issues: Commitment to achieving net-zero emissions by 2030
social_issues: Reputational damage and customer trust issues due to data security breaches
governance_issues: Scrutiny of data security practices and potential governance lapses
